programme.title: Cheap Thrills
programme.desc: Syafa dan Pink Azwan menjelajah hampir seluruh semenanjung Malaysia mencari tempat-tempat yang sesuai untuk healing dan menjenguk lokasi di mana kita boleh shopping barang-barang yang tak lapuk dek zaman.

programme.title: Oh Baby Remy!
programme.desc: Remy Ishak bakal menjadi bapa kepada seorang bayi lelaki . Bersama isterinya, Ezza, Kita akan lihat Remy melakukan kesilapan, berkelakuan seperti newbie and transformasi Remy dalam semua aspek kehidupannya.

programme.title: Cinta Hilang Kata
programme.desc: Nurul Masmin dilahirkan dari sebuah keluarga yang berada dan bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang penulis.Namun, kehidupan dan citanya terbantut apabila dia dikahwinkan dengan anak pengasuhnya, Amirul.

programme.title: Cinta Hilang Kata
programme.desc: Nurul Masmin dilahirkan dari sebuah keluarga yang berada dan bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang penulis.Namun, kehidupan dan citanya terbantut apabila dia dikahwinkan dengan anak pengasuhnya, Amirul.

programme.title: Cinta Hilang Kata
programme.desc: Nurul Masmin dilahirkan dari sebuah keluarga yang berada dan bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang penulis.Namun, kehidupan dan citanya terbantut apabila dia dikahwinkan dengan anak pengasuhnya, Amirul.

programme.title: Cinta Hilang Kata
programme.desc: Nurul Masmin dilahirkan dari sebuah keluarga yang berada dan bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang penulis.Namun, kehidupan dan citanya terbantut apabila dia dikahwinkan dengan anak pengasuhnya, Amirul.

programme.title: Cinta Hilang Kata
programme.desc: Nurul Masmin dilahirkan dari sebuah keluarga yang berada dan bercita-cita untuk menjadi seorang penulis.Namun, kehidupan dan citanya terbantut apabila dia dikahwinkan dengan anak pengasuhnya, Amirul.

programme.title: Aku Bukan BIMBO
programme.desc: Elsuraya percaya Azad adalah punca kematian ibu bapanya dalam satu kemalangan dan membenci lelaki itu yang dalam diam mencintainya. Perkara sebenar disimpan rapi oleh Azad dan sahabat baiknya, Dani Ikram.

programme.title: Keluarga Iskandar The Movie
programme.desc: Filem komedi kekeluargaan mengisahkan kehidupan harian Haji Iskandar, isteri beliau, lima anak mereka dan keluarga masing-masing yang lucu dan huru-hara.

programme.title: Roda Panas S2
programme.desc: Trend terkini kereta atau motosikal mengenai enjin, roda dan aktiviti yang berkaitan dengan dunia automotif.

programme.title: Fantasy Escape
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang merealisasikan impian peminat bertuah untuk melakukan aktiviti yang mereka gemari bersama selebriti pilihan mereka yang turut berkongsi pengalaman dan memberi motivasi.

programme.title: Jodoh-Jodoh Annisa
programme.desc: Berkisarkan konflik keluarga dan percintaan. Annisa terpaksa menempuh jalan hidup yang berliku baik dalam kerjaya dan percintaan. Dugaan hidup memaksa Annisa memilih antara lima jejaka.

programme.title: Healing With Zizan
programme.desc: Dua selebriti lelaki tanahair yang akan ditemu bual oleh Zizan tentang Hijrah mereka, berkongsi pandangan dan perjalanan rohani mereka tentang apa yang mendorong mereka untuk maju ke hadapan

programme.title: Aku Bukan BIMBO
programme.desc: Elsuraya percaya Azad adalah punca kematian ibu bapanya dalam satu kemalangan dan membenci lelaki itu yang dalam diam mencintainya. Perkara sebenar disimpan rapi oleh Azad dan sahabat baiknya, Dani Ikram.

programme.title: Hantu Kak Limah Balik Rumah
programme.desc: Wira Kampung Pisang, Husin akhirnya kembali setelah sekian lama bekerja di Singapura. Dia mendapati jirannya, Kak Limah telah mati beberapa hari dan kini menghantui seluruh kampung itu.

programme.title: Kultus
programme.desc: Syakilla seorang pelajar Singapura di New York diperangkap untuk menyertai kumpulan kultus ELIXR. Syafik terbang ke New York untuk menyelamatkan adiknya. Adakah mereka berjaya menyelamatkan diri?

programme.title: Akak Akak Sangat
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan bual bicara mengenai topik- topik hangat yang akan diperbincangkan dalam keadaan yang kasual.

programme.title: Bas Stop!
programme.desc: Selebriti dan pelawak mengalami sendiri situasi sebenar kehidupan seharian pemandu teksi, pembaiki kasut, penyanyi jalanan dan pelbagai lagi dari sudut komikal.

programme.title: Selera Rasa Seksa
programme.desc: Saksikan Datuk Chef Wan dalam sebuah game show masakan komedi yang riuh! Pedas! Panas! Bersama selebriti terkenal tanah air.

programme.title: Buka Kedai : Now In Tokyo
programme.desc: Buka Kedai: Now in Tokyo menampilkan 4 selebriti Malaysia yang terdiri daripada Nabila Huda, Shashic, Leona dan Eric. Mereka bakal melakukan misi berniaga di Tokyo, Jepun.

programme.title: Opocot Melatah Budak Pejabat
programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Dato AC Mizal, rancangan latah paling kecoh kini kembali dengan musim terbaru. Saksikan kaki latah popular seperti PS Mansur, Eida Moin and Nazia Mustafar menggeletek anda seisi keluarga.

programme.title: RSVP Aku Datang
programme.desc: RSVP menonjolkan pelbagai acara dari berbagai kaum diMalaysia dari majlis perkahwinan, majlis aqiqah hinggalah ke majlis Ponggal dan banyak lagi.

programme.title: Kuali Terbalik
programme.desc: Sebuah program baru yang menggabungkan elemen drama, komedi dan program masakan dalam satu rancangan. Setiap episod akan menampilkan spoof dari drama terbaik Astro juga dari filem box office

programme.title: Komediri S2
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan stand up comedy yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: Tele Berkembar
programme.desc: Saksikan telefilem komedi yang bakal mencuitkan hati anda.

programme.title: 7 Minggu Sebelum Kahwin
programme.desc: Hanya tinggal 7 minggu saja tarikh perkahwinan, pelbagai masalah menimpa Amar dan Syifa yang mengganggu persiapan dan menduga cinta mereka.

programme.title: Aunty Reporting For Duty
programme.desc: Saksikan geng mak-mak melakukan cabaran yang menguji fizikal dan minda mereka. Mampukah geng mak-mak menyelesaikan misi yang diberi?

programme.title: Tanya Sama Pokok
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kehidupan di sebuah kampung moden yang sudah semakin terdedah dengan kemodenan tetapi dalam waktu yang sama masih mengekalkan ciri-ciri hidup berkampung.

programme.title: Lawak Minggu Ini 2013
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan komedi pentas yang pasti menghiburkan anda sekeluarga

programme.title: Jangan Buat Hal
programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat Nana Mahazan bersama selebriti popular melatah sambil bermain permainan menarik dan kumpulan manakah yang digelar juara bagi setiap episod.

programme.title: Super Spontan Superstar

programme.title: Beneath the Waves
programme.desc: Asia has the longest coastline of any continent and the earths richest coral reefs. This episode explores Asias waters, as spectacular as they are diverse, and never-seen-before animal behaviour.

programme.title: Above the Clouds
programme.desc: Asia is the most mountainous continent on earth. From the tropical south to its barren centre, its highest places are home to some of our planets most remarkable wildlife.

programme.title: The Frozen North
programme.desc: In the remote reaches of Asias frozen north, creatures must overcome unique challenges, finding exceptional ways to thrive in a hostile world that pushes life to its very limits.

programme.title: Tangled Worlds
programme.desc: Asias jungles are beautiful and exceptionally diverse, but whilst they provide shelter, food and opportunity, they are also full of dangers and hidden threats.

programme.title: Crowded Continent
programme.desc: In the planets most densely populated continent, animals live at extremely close quarters with people, from tigers making a home in town to elephants stopping traffic for food.

programme.title: The Arid Heart
programme.desc: In the heart of Asia lie vast arid lands. These deserts and dry grasslands are so hostile, they push life to the limit. The animals that live here are some of the earths toughest.

programme.title: Saving Asia
programme.desc: Many passionate people are dedicated to saving the wild animals of Asia. These individuals and their ingenious solutions give us hope and optimism for the future of the continent.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: The Marsh Pride of lions have lived for generations in Kenyas famous Maasai Mara Reserve. The prides history is a tale of shifting loyalties, bloody take overs and sheer resilience. Naturalists, guides, vets and conservationists in Kenya and back in the UK offer a unique perspective on the life of these lions.

programme.title: Jamies 5 Ingredient Mediterranean Meals (S1)
programme.desc: This time, Jamie shows us a roast dinner cooked all together in one pot, cutting down on washing up but never on flavour; and his store-cupboard version of a speedy carbonara that can use up whatever veg you have to hand. He shares two ways to use pre-packed ingredients to make crowd-pleasing starters or sides, and two stars of Middle Eastern cuisine show how store-cupboard spices can transform everyday ingredients into truly mouth-watering meals.

programme.title: How Korean Pop Culture Is Transforming Design
programme.desc: Amid Seouls pulsating energy, Haslina Amin reveals an architectural renaissance thats reshaping the city, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: The Nation Where Robots and Humans Get Along
programme.desc: Join Haslinda Amin as she explores the way robots and AI are integrated into Japanese life. From drones managing crops to unmanned harvesters, see how its paving the way to a more efficient future.

programme.title: Can Global Shipping Go Green?
programme.desc: South Korea is emerging as a pivotal force in reshaping maritime transportation, leading the way to a future with autonomous ships and more eco-friendly propulsion systems.

programme.title: Monkey Laundering
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Scambaiters
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Irretrievable
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: Stealing The Gods
programme.desc: In a remote village temple in India, a daring heist saw precious and ancient cultural heritage disappear. Two citizen detectives work to bring down one of the biggest art thieves in history.

programme.title: Russias Shadow Fleet
programme.desc: A "shadow fleet" of aging tankers is keeping Russian oil flowing. Bloomberg set out to uncover the network of intermediaries working to sell the Kremlins oil while getting rich in the process.

programme.title: Robots: The Aliens We Made
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets some of the worlds most advanced, intelligent, robots. Will the creation of a synthetic species with human-like intelligence improve the human experience, or end it?

programme.title: Love in the Age of Machines
programme.desc: Can we have real intimacy with machines? Emily Chang explores the future of such connections and the technologies powering a growing market of relationships-on-demand.

programme.title: Your Brain Is the Next Tech Frontier
programme.desc: From brain implants that allow paralyzed patients to communicate to the wearable devices enhancing our capabilities, brain-computer interfaces could change the way we use our minds forever.

programme.title: How Tech Is Breaking the Rules of Biology
programme.desc: From birth to death, tech is stretching the boundaries of biology. In this episode of Posthuman, we explore the discoveries that could transform reproduction, healthcare and how we die.

programme.title: AMD CEO Lisa Su
programme.desc: The Advanced Micro Devices CEO spent the better part of her ten year career engineering one of the biggest turnarounds in Silicon Valley history. Now shes preparing for battle against NVIDIA.

programme.title: How Stephen Curry Is Building an Empire Beyond Basketball
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets NBA player and Thirty Ink CEO Stephen Curry to discuss his growing business portfolio, partnership with Under Armour and retail ambitions to rival Nikes Jordan Brand.

programme.title: Why Ari Emanuel is Betting Big on UFC and WWE
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Endeavor and TKO CEO Ari Emanuel to discuss how he built a multi-billion dollar sports and entertainment empire, the future of Hollywood and whats next.

programme.title: How Instacarts CEO Fidji Simo Brought French Style to Silicon Valley
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Instacart CEO Fidji Simo in her hometown in the South of France, and learns about her journey from a small fishing village to the C-Suite in Silicon Valley.

programme.title: Whistleblowers Warn About the Dark Side of AI
programme.desc: Whistleblowers Warn About the Dark Side of AI. Emily is joined by Ifeoma Ozoma, Timnit Gebru, and Safiya Noble, who have raised the alarm on Big Techs growing influence in our daily lives.

programme.title: Angel Citys Big Bet on Womens Soccer
programme.desc: Emily sits down with Angel City FCs founders: Natalie Portman, Kara Nortman, and Julie Uhrman. Now in its second season, the team is changing the culture of professional sports.

programme.title: Inside Silicon Valleys Famous Startup School
programme.desc: Inside Silicon Valleys Famous Startup School. Chang also gets a behind-the-scenes look at Tans at-home YouTube studio, where he makes content for entrepreneurs.

programme.title: How AI Helped Microsoft Get its Groove Back
programme.desc: Emily sits down with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella to hear about how AI is shaking up the competition for search.

programme.title: Can the DAmelios Make It Beyond TikTok?
programme.desc: Emily heads to LA to meet the TikTok famous DAmelio family. They discuss their expansion into television, investing, and building their own brand.

programme.title: Google CEO Sundar Pichai and the Future of AI
programme.desc: Google and Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai sits down with Emily Chang to discuss the future of search, accelerating work on Googles AI models and how his upbringing prepared him for this moment.

programme.title: When JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon Speaks, the World Listens

programme.title: Why Netflix Is Betting Big on Latin America
programme.desc: Emily Chang travels to Latin America to visit one of Netflixs most ambitious productions and get a closer look at its global strategy.

programme.desc: GMs Risky Bet on the Future of Electric Vehicles. Emily Chang meets GM CEO Mary Barra for a look at her ambitious plan to transform the veteran automaker into a fast-moving tech company.

programme.title: How Youtube Became Must Watch TV
programme.desc: How Youtube Became Must Watch TV. Emily Chang speaks with YouTube CEO Neal Mohan about the creator economy, staying atop the AI wave and transforming the platform into the worlds biggest streamer.

programme.desc: The Martians accidentally break the train bridge over the ravine. Then, the Zee Mobile wont stop crashing into MacBarms barn door.

programme.title: Pinecone Palooza/The Big Footed Cave Bird
programme.desc: Grandma and Timmy learn to carve stone for the Pinecone Art Show. Then, Ranger Nat comes across the Big-Footed Cave Bird while hiking.

programme.title: Skate Park/Catwalk/Ice Creamed/Snow Cap/Rock On
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a skate park for the kids.

programme.title: Flush Hour/War of the Weirds/Magic of Spring/Take Us Out to the Ballgame/A Mid-Autumn Nights Scream
programme.desc: The babies learn the purpose of toilets.

programme.title: The Same Badge
programme.desc: As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: The Days of the Week Badge
programme.desc: After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: The Feelings Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels notice that Happy isnt acting like his normal self, and hes strangely wearing new trainers. Happy doesnt know what hes feeling, and his friends want to help him.

programme.title: The Choir Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels become enchanted when they hear a piece of music from Duggees choir. They quickly learn what makes a choir.

programme.title: The Listening Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels hear a strange sound that theyve not heard before, so they ask Duggee to help identify it.

programme.title: The Wisdom Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: The Commuting Badge
programme.desc: Norrie is running late to Squirrel Club, so Duggee teaches the squirrels what a commute is - a journey that can take you from home to learn, work or play.

programme.title: The Ball Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: The News Badge
programme.desc: After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

programme.title: The Difficult Badge
programme.desc: As the Squirrels appreciate Norries new bike, they discover that she doesnt know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: The Cinema Badge
programme.desc: Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: The Getting Ready Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: The Size Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: The Wish Badge
programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: The List Badge
programme.desc: Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrels activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: The Music Video Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: The Exercise Badge
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: The Dos and Donts Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: The Nature Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, dont interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: The Recipe Badge
programme.desc: The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they arent sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: The Imagination Badge
programme.desc: When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.title: The Carrot Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring Duggees crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: The Face Painting Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but cant find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: The Transport Badge
programme.desc: When Duggees old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: The Talent Badge
programme.desc: Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - its King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: The Mime Badge
programme.desc: Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They dont understand what hes doing and think its funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: The Why Badge
programme.desc: Why do my feet hurt?, Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them why is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: The Sibling Badge
programme.desc: Roly reveals hes expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: The Monster Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: The Diary Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... its Duggees diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: The Metal Detector Badge
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: The Leaf Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels and Duggee go looking for a special leaf, but find something surprising!

programme.title: The Spot the Difference Badge
programme.desc: Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Happys First Day
programme.desc: Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: The Library Badge
programme.desc: When the Squirrels cant figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Tags First Day
programme.desc: The Squirrels are crafting in the Clubhouse when Betty saves Tag from throwing water across the table instead of glitter.

programme.title: The Hat Badge
programme.desc: King Tiger interrupts the Squirrels quiet time when he turns up to the Clubhouse with a magic hat on instead of his crown.

programme.title: Bettys First Day
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun trying out games but are surprised to find out that Betty didnt always enjoy playing.

programme.title: The Choreography Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet Duggees old dance crew and learn that he was kicked out because he couldnt stick to the choreography. The Squirrels are surprised because Duggee is such a good dancer!

programme.title: The Pet Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a scruffelump in the woods, and despite Duggees reservations, take him in. But they soon learn the responsibilities of taking care of a pet.

programme.title: The Lost Property Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels lose Tag in the Clubhouse but to find him theyre going to have to figure out where the Lost Property room is.

programme.title: The Mountain Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels need to rescue Enid when they see her at the top of the Mighty Sugar Bun Mountain.

programme.title: The Accessory Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee accessorising his tie and want to learn how to do it themselves. All of the Squirrels accessorise an item and showcase their goods.

programme.title: The Ambition Badge
programme.desc: Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: The Rainbow Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: The Dream Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they cant stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: The Eating Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: The Delivery Badge
programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: The Leaf Badge
programme.desc: The Squirrels and Duggee go looking for a special leaf, but find something surprising!

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: Constable Wen Chao Fan and his father are framed for a jewel robbery they did not commit. On the run from the law and becoming a wanted fugitive, Wen must recover the jewels in order to clear his family name, but unfortunately he is not the only one seeking the stolen jewels...

programme.title: The Delinquent
programme.desc: This is a coming-of-age tale depicting the lower class Hong Kong troubled youths in the 1960s and the societal issues that they face. Wang Chung is a hotheaded and rebellious teen who is tempted by the dark side, and have to unfortunately pay a huge price for it.

programme.title: Clan Of The White Lotus
programme.desc: The head of White Lotus Clan, Lo, is a highly skilled martial artist who supports the Qing government and helps destroy the rebellion group. Hung from Shaolin who kills Los brother, is being hunted and hides in another rebel Hus house. The clan attacks at night killing Hu and his sister, but Hung manages to get Hus pregnant wife to safety.

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The King Boxer
programme.desc: This tale of a honorable fighters retraining in the "Iron Palm" style, that became the first international martial arts movie hit and made a continent-spanning star of Lo Lieh.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the Embroidery Bandit starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: King Gambler
programme.desc: This film was actually a lively forerunner to the gambling film craze, which eventually swept Asian cinema. Here, its cardsharp versus cardsharp with a lot more kung-fu action, in a battle of wits and fists to become the king of the casino. The double stings and triple crosses raise in complexity and imagination until what started as an unusual box office risk became a top ten hit of 1976.

programme.title: Global News
programme.desc: Be updated with the latest news developments around the world.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: CCTV-4 brings you the latest on Asia news, from an Asian perspective.

programme.title: Hui Cui Jie Mu
programme.desc: Stay tuned to CCTV-4 as we introduce you to the various content and programming on the channel.

programme.title: Across The Strait
programme.desc: Across The Strait traces the much-discussed issues across the Strait, reflecting the will of the citizens on two sides of the Strait and detailing the Chinese Governments policy of "one country, two systems".

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: China News focuses on the latest news and social changes happening in China as well as all over the world.

programme.title: International Depth
programme.desc: An international news weekly review.

programme.title: Hai Zhi Yao

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood
programme.desc: The famous "Gang Trio" is hired to kidnap a baby for 30 million dollars. When they realize that the triad is after both the ransom and the babys life, they decide to make the hostage their protege. Cornered by cops and threatened by gangsters, the three Rob-B-Hood must put the baby safely back in his cradle.

programme.title: Heroic Duo
programme.desc: Police officer Ken needs help to solve a grisly crime that the offender has no recollection of committing. Ken seeks out Jack, a former psychologist who is now imprisoned. Forming an uneasy truce, this unconventional duo sets out to find the man responsible. It is at this time that Ken falls into a trap set up by Jack...

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged young and eligible women for Emperor Kangxis selection. Kangxi is uninterested and becomes bored with the process. He decides to travel incognito as a businessman around the country when he meets Nalan Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man to avoid a possible arranged marriage with the Emperor...

programme.title: The Myth
programme.desc: An archaeologist Jack, and a scientist William, stumble upon ancient Qin Dynasty artifacts that lead them to the mausoleum and mysteriously connects Jack to his past life as a warrior in ancient China, starting their mythical journey.

programme.title: Law Or Justice
programme.desc: Lawyer Yip defends a rapist and gets him acquitted. Yips boyfriend Fong, a police inspector, knows he is guilty and despises Yip for not upholding justice. The victims sister takes revenge by spiking the rapists drink but is raped instead. This puts the rapist back in court. Will Yip choose to uphold law or justice this time?

programme.title: God of Gamblers Return
programme.desc: The God of Gamblers, Gao Jin, quits gambling and live a quiet life with his wife. However, a Taiwanese crime boss wants to become the new God of Gamblers and get rid of him, so he kills Gao Jins pregnant wife to force him to the casino table. Gao Jin is indignant and vows to fight the crime boss to avenge his wifes death.

programme.title: Teenage Dreamers
programme.desc: Ting Ting is a student in an all-girl high school. She tries out for the schools stage production of Romeo and Juliet with an all-boy school and promptly falls for the lead, Jackson. While Ting Ting is swept away by the excitement of her first love, Jackson turns out to be more of a player than a partner.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and "accepted wisdom" to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, the Agenda quite simply sets the agenda. You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling. The program provides a unique platform for the best current affairs documentaries from around the globe. Big Story aims to present the contemporary world and Chinas global perspectives on the contemporary world to an international audience.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on Chinas rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the countrys culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the worlds top stories as they happen. programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and Chinas top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in Chinas domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Groups new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. They will share their insights on the major events shaping todays world, providing an international viewpoint to understand our times, the visions we share, the challenges we face and the efforts we can make for a better future.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing Chinas perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Full Frame

programme.title: Nightclub Murder Or Self-Defense Shooting?
programme.desc: An argument erupts outside a Florida nightclub. One man is killed, and another is charged with murder. Was it a case of cold-blooded murder, or did he have to shoot to save his own life?

programme.title: Sins Of The Heart
programme.desc: Young, rich and religious, John and Nikki Hillrich fall in love at college. Its a match made in heaven - but hell is not far off.

programme.title: Deceitful Secrets
programme.desc: Cecil and Larlane Brown have been together for years. But their secrets and lies, ignored and neglected for decades, threaten to turn their 50-year relationship into a bloody battleground.

programme.title: Avenged
programme.desc: With Jeffrey Epstein deceased, the survivors continue to seek justice and finally see a glimmer of hope with the shocking arrest of alleged co-conspirator Ghislaine Maxwell on July 2, 2020.

programme.title: End Game
programme.desc: In Mobile, a professor is murdered in his own home. It takes a missing gaming console and a strategic game of cat and mouse with the suspects for detectives and prosecutors to get justice.

programme.title: The Aftermath: Part Two
programme.desc: Orion and Kendra are revealed to everyone, and tensions boil over when Jacob goes head to head with the other participants. Sheriff Dance and Chief Capehart reveal what lies ahead for PCDC.

programme.title: Linda Carty
programme.desc: Linda Carty was sentenced to death on February 19, 2001 for the kidnapping of three-day-old newborn Ray Cabrera, and the kidnapping and murder of his mother, Joana Rodriguez.

A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a son and daughter denounce their murderous father; a fatal drunk driver breaks down in court; a misbehaving spectator feels the judges wrath; and more.
A look at some of the wildest courtroom moments: a murder suspect spits on his lawyer; a literal Karen is fined for refusing to wear a mask in a supermarket; and more.

programme.title: A Jellyfish In The Sky And More
programme.desc: In Portland, Texas, a terminally ill woman is visited by a familiar spirit. Ghost hunters talk to the dead in one of Americas most haunted villas. A UFO flies by campers in Castell, Texas.

programme.title: Nightclub Murder Or Self-Defense Shooting?
programme.desc: An argument erupts outside a Florida nightclub. One man is killed, and another is charged with murder. Was it a case of cold-blooded murder, or did he have to shoot to save his own life?

programme.title: The Enemy Within
programme.desc: When a loving wife and mother is found stabbed to death inside her home, a team of investigators dedicate eight years to finding her killer.

programme.title: Kids Who Kill - Aaron Campbell
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old Aaron Campbell didnt admit his crimes until after his conviction. He abducted six-year-old neighbour Alesha MacPhailand, carried her to a nearby wood, and raped and murdered her.

programme.title: Part 2 (A)
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti continues his mission to tie Cottingham to additional murders and to get him to confess to more cold-case homicides.

programme.title: Jim (Part A)
programme.desc: Jim has been a collector from a very young age but some of the tragedies in his life have compounded Jims hoarding behavior.

programme.title: Jim (Part B)
programme.desc: In 2019, Jims daughter, Elesha, lost her job and needed a place to stay so she moved. Moving in with Jim however, dealing with the hoard has been the most difficult part of her life.

programme.title: Ashley Kline
programme.desc: Residents of Robeson, Pennsylvania were stunned when Ashley Kline went missing on New Years Eve. The 12-day search turned up several suspects until investigators uncovered suspicious text messages.

programme.title: Serial Killer On The Run
programme.desc: A serial killer faces tough questions in the interrogation room and after a woman is found dead in the middle of the road, the finger pointing begins when three suspects are interviewed.

programme.title: Footsteps In The Attic
programme.desc: Tina Bowen believes her dead mother is playing tricks on the family, until a battle with a flesh-and-blood intruder uncovers a real-life horror movie.

programme.title: Killer Mom Or Innocent Parent?
programme.desc: A mother of four is accused of killing her 11-week-old baby and is now facing life in prison. The prosecution alleges the infant was violently shaken-but the defence insists this isnt what happened.

programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how theyve healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: Big Island Blow Out
programme.desc: When a young womans body is pulled from the ocean off the Big Island, accusations threaten to destroy the local community. As tensions grow, a surprising discovery leads detectives to a devastating truth.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her familys murder. Investigators suspect a serial killer, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: Shawna Forde
programme.desc: Shawna Forde was convicted for a 2009 crime that resulted in the violent murders of Raul Flores and his 9-year-old daughter Brisenia. She was sentenced to death.

programme.title: Sandi Nieves
programme.desc: In 1998, a fire in Sandi Nieves home that started under suspicious circumstances led to her conviction for arson, the murders of her four daughters, and the attempted murder of her son David.

programme.desc: When railroad mechanic Robert Limon is shot and killed by Jonathan Hearn, an investigation leads to Roberts widow - and spurs questions about her involvement in the crime.

programme.desc: When a parolee is bounced from his job, he seeks retribution on a peaceful, unwitting community when he kidnaps, tortures and kills a mother and caregiver.

programme.desc: A man with a dark past is brought into the interrogation room after a woman is murdered and a young girl vanishes.

programme.desc: When a beloved art teacher is murdered in her own home, her husband and a growing list of suspects face tough questions in the interrogation room.

programme.title: Spirit Of Christmas
programme.desc: Lucky and friends must figure out how to get home in time for Christmas when a falling boulder -- and a serious snowstorm -- derail their travel plans.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Christmas Bonus
programme.desc: _x000D_ _x000D_When Boss Baby accidentally gets mistaken for an elf and sent to the North Pole on Christmas Eve, he mobilizes unpaid elf workers against an old nemesis: that charity-loving hippie people call Santa Claus. Meanwhile, Tim races to the North Pole to get his baby brother back home in time for Templeton Family Christmas traditions.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Xtreme Xploits of the Xplosive Xmas Special
programme.desc: George and Harold love Christmas, but they feel like it could use some upgrades. So they make a comic about a new version of the holiday: BLISSMAS. Instead of red bows, laser shows! Instead of ugly sweaters, cool capes! Instead of decorating trees, creating tree-bots! The boys take Melvins time toad back to convince Santa to incorporate some of their ideas to his new holiday. But they come back to the present to find that their plan didnt work quite how theyd hoped.

programme.title: Tip And Oh: Home For The Holidays
programme.desc: Oh takes it upon himself to introduce Christmas joy to his fellow Boovs. Unfortunately, his well-meaning mission nearly destroys the city.

programme.title: Lucky and the Fearless Fillies
programme.desc: When the PALs and Snips get caught in a sandstorm, the girls must keep Snips calm and safe

programme.title: Floaties
programme.desc: A bummed out Tina takes a vacation to the baby resort, Floaties! However, her mind is still back at work, and struggled to actually enjoy her vacation. And it gets worse when Crispin Biscuits switches electronic ID tags with her, causing everyone to assume Tina actually is Crispin Biscuits. With Crispin having booked her for a seemingly endless stay, Tina is trapped in a paradise nightmare, and in a tunnel of madness starts to think that she may even be Crispin.

programme.title: Breaking The Bank
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits heists the underwater Baby Bank in an attempt to steal all the funds from Boss and Tinas new company. Boss, Tina and Banker Baby Benny must infiltrate the bank via submarine to stop this high-stakes aquatic robbery. But Boss and Tina struggle to stay on the same page after Tina admits that she might, kinda, sorta be thinking about retiring as a regular baby.

programme.title: Hate That Baby!
programme.desc: After Crispin Biscuits changes the Baby Love economy to reward companies for bringing in baby hate, Boss Baby is forced to make himself the most hated baby in town to save their startup company. Meanwhile, Tina needs to end Crispin Biscuits attacks on their company before she can finally hang up her boss role and retire to a life of cuddle time with daddy and mommy.

programme.title: The Battle of Tianshang Part 2
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents-her mom.

programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! programme.title: Animal House
programme.desc: As an approaching storm threatens Berk, Hiccup must work fast to make peace between the food-providing farm animals and the dragons.

programme.title: The Terrible Twos
programme.desc: When Hiccup adopts a baby dragon that appears orphaned, Toothless becomes jealous and the baby dragons bereaved mother threatens the village.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Shane Mosley vs. Luis Collazo
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features welterweights Sugar Shane Mosley (43-4, 37 KOs) and Luis Collazo (27-2, 13 KOs) fighting over the interim WBC title. This fight took place at the Mandalay Bay Resort and Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA, on February 10, 2007.

programme.title: Zagreb Grand Prix
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Zagreb Grand Prix, where some of the young Judo fans get the opportunity to train with former Olympic champion Mark Huizinga and triple world champion Illias Iliadis. Plus we watch as Judos biggest star Teddy Riner competes in the +100 kg division.

programme.title: Budapest 2023 - Episode 3
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Dont miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Chris Arreola vs. Tomasz Adamek
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a heavyweight collision between Chris Arreola and Tomasz Adamek in a battle of one-loss competitors. Also on the card, Rocky Jearez takes on Jorge Barrios before a gruesome cut calls an end to the fight.

programme.title: Kyushu, Japan: Show 3
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Daieisho, Shohozan, Aoiyama and Chiyonokuni from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Endy Semeleer vs Redouan Laarkoubi
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. Its kickboxings most talented athletes at their finest! From Abu Dhabi, UAE, this episode features top-10 lightweight Endy Semeleer (the Netherlands) vs. Redouan Laarkoubi (the Netherlands).

programme.title: FS MMA Fernando Rodrigues Jr. vs. Karol Bedorf
programme.desc: In this edition of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we highlight the Main Event of KSW 37, featuring Fernando Rodrigues Jr. of Brazil taking on local favorite Karol Bedorf of Poland. Rodrigues brings in a stellar record of 10-2 into the cage, while his opponent Beforf comes in an equally impressive 14-2. Its a huge Main Event from Poland, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a bout to determine a new NABF welterweight champion, as Andre Berto faces David Estrada. Also on the card, kickboxing legends Errol Zimmerman and Daniel Ghita battle to a gruesome end.

programme.title: Venice Qualifying: Part 3
programme.desc: The next season opens with a qualifying round in Venice Beach, California. More than half of the obstacles used on this season were never seen before, and this premiere features exciting new challenges such as the Frame Slider, Domino Hill, Chain Swing and Flying Nun Chucks. Returning fan favorites in Venice Beach include parkour enthusiasts Kyle Cochran and Brent Steffensen.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Paul Williams I
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features middleweights Sergio Maravilla Martinez (44-1, 24 KOs) vs. Paul The Punisher Williams (37-1, 27 KOs) from Boardwalk Hall in Atlantic City, New Jersey, USA, on December 5, 2009. The result was a controversial majority decision, and the two would eventually square off in a rematch about a year later.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Lamont Peterson vs. Amir Khan
programme.desc: Lamont Peterson takes on Amir Khan in a bout with a controversial ending, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Tashkent Grand Prix
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israels fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Marcos Maidana
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Amir Khan defending the WBA light welterweight title against Marcos Maidana in a bout that earned 2010 Fight of the Year honors from the Boxing Writers Association of America. Also on the card, a young Adrien Broner showcases his skills.

programme.title: Kyushu, Japan: Show 5
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 5 featuring Aoiyama, Endo, Takakeisho and Tamawashi from the Kyushu basho, 2018.

programme.title: In Kerala, India
programme.desc: Episode 12: Kerala, India - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kalarippayattu and the Martial Art of Sword, Shield, Sticks, Open Hand and Kicks with Master Sureshan Nambiar.

programme.title: FS MMA Ante Delija vs. Oli Thompson
programme.desc: In this episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we take you to action from KSW in Zagreb, Croatia, when local heavyweight Ante Delija from Dubrovnik takes on Oli "The Spartan" Thompson of East Sussex, England. The massive Delija, standing 65" and nearly 240 lbs (108 kg) holds a spectacular 16-3 record with tremendous power. Thompson is a veteran with 20 wins in his MMA career, and can stand toe-to-toe with Delija in his home country.

programme.title: WCCB Carlos Ocampo vs. Mikael Zewski
programme.desc: From the Colisee in Quebec, Canada, Mikael Zewski competes in front of his hometown fans against world-ranked veteran Carlos Ocampo of Mexico, with the WBC Continental Americas Super Welterweight Title on the line. Ocampo is a tough competitor, taking on the best in the world including Errol Spence Jr. for the IBF Welterweight World Championship. Zewski is also no stranger to the big stage, having held several North American and International WBA, IBF, and WBO titles himself.

programme.title: Budapest World Championship
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: The Big Weekend Show

programme.desc: The team enlists special equipment in an epic search for two large air force planes that vanished without a trace with dozens of people on board. Despite a massive search, nothing was ever found.

programme.title: 50 Day Freeze
programme.desc: Six Alone veterans take on their biggest - and coldest - challenge yet when they are dropped on the frigid North Atlantic coast just days before the start of winter.

programme.title: Heres the Drill
programme.desc: As the team begins drilling in search of a metal object buried in the Mesa, they also perform a new experiment at the Triangle that causes startling UFOs to appear on Skinwalker Ranch.

programme.title: Supersized Deadfall Trap
programme.desc: Past Alone participants Britt Ahart (Seasons 3 and 5), Jordan Jonas (Season 6 Winner) and Lucas Miller (Season 1) tackle one of their biggest challenges yet; building a massive Deadfall Trap.

programme.title: Wilderness Watercraft
programme.desc: Expert bushcrafters and former Alone participants Clay Hayes (Season 8), Callie North (Season 3) and Britt Ahart (Seasons 3 and 5) tackle the toughest challenge yet; building a working watercraft.

programme.title: The Weird Wild West
programme.desc: The American frontier is rich with legends of Native Americans and outlaws, but also eerie tales of cursed mountains, monsters, and UFOs. Could these tales be true? Is the Wild West stranger than we think?

programme.title: The Gambler
programme.desc: ALF develops a bad gambling habit but sees it as an opportunity to help the Tanners pay for their house. He runs up a huge debt with Nick the Fish, however, and when Nick comes to collect, ALF panics.

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: ALF shares his special intergalactic knowledge with Brian, who gets into trouble when he tells his class there are 11 planets in our solar system.

programme.title: La Cucaracha
programme.desc: The Tanners are plagued by a huge cockroach that stowed away on ALFs spacecraft. When the bug is doused with spray, it grows even larger until ALF finally discovers a way to get rid of the uninvited guest.

programme.title: To All a Good Night
programme.desc: A small-town photographer saves the life of a mysterious man, who may just be in town to buy her familys parkland - which is also the location of the annual Christmas celebration

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: When a young woman with stage-4 liver disease meets the Marine whos organ donation could save her, the last thing they expect is to fall in love.

programme.desc: Darrin quarrels with Samanthas cousin Serena, who is her double. Serena sings rock and roll lullabies to Tabitha. Then she causes a riot at a park love in and is arrested.

programme.title: Wildlife

programme.title: Persona

programme.desc: Dr. Bellows and Gen. Peterson wonder if Tony is ready for a moon trip when be sleepwalks into the office.

programme.desc: The most frightened guy on Earth leads a motley crew of survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

programme.title: Daylight

programme.title: Grease

The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: Good Partner
programme.desc: The story follows popular divorce lawyer Cha Eun-Kyung (Jang Na-ra), who finds herself faced with her own marital crisis. She often clashes with rookie lawyer Han Yoo-Ri (Nam Ji-Hyun) over cases. A workplace battle between the two lawyers is about to unfold.

programme.title: My Perfect Stranger
programme.desc: The story depicts a strange and beautiful story of time travel between Yoon Hae Jun (Kim Dong Wook) who seeks the truth behind a murder case, and Baek Yoon Young (Jin Ki Joo) who wants to prevent the marriage of her parents while getting trapped in year 1987.

programme.title: Forensic JD
programme.desc: While assisting the police in their investigation and trying to reverse the case involving her father, forensic doctor Song An Yan (Charlene Choi) joins hands with hot-blooded detective Liu Zhi Ming (Joseph Chang) in their desperate search for the truth.

programme.title: Unchained Love
programme.desc: During the reign of Long Hua, Xiao Duo, a powerful eunuch in charge of the imperial court, plans a palace mutiny with the help of a tribute lady Bu Yinlou. What is the fate between the two?

programme.title: A Female Student Arrives at the Imperial College
programme.desc: Story of the only daughter of the Grand Marshal, Sang Qi, who becomes the only female student at the Imperial College.

programme.desc: We intorduce the contents and activities of NHK WORLD-JAPAN to make the station and programs known to more people all over the world. This is the window of the station to the world.

programme.title: NHK Newsline

programme.title: A CatS-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Stroll around a World Heritage Site with an island kitty. Then, get your favorite saying written on a lucky rice scoop before playing with kitties in the historical town of Takehara.

programme.title: Ukiyoe Edo-Life: Airing Laundry
programme.desc: Its summer, and a group of women have gathered at the local well to do laundry in the shade. We learn about the different techniques and tools they used to wash and dry different types of kimonos.

programme.title: Kaizoku: The Kurushima Straits
programme.desc: The Murakami Kaizoku were seafarers and fighters in the Seto Inland Sea. We explore their history and legacy, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time, the Kurushima Straits.

programme.title: Pups Save the Polar Bears / A Pup in Sheeps Clothing
programme.desc: Ryder and the pups must fly to the Arctic in the Air Patroller to rescue the lost cubs. // When little lambs keep running away from Farmer Als pasture, its up to the Paw Patrol to find the missing sheep.

programme.title: Pups Save a School Bus / Pups Save the Songbirds
programme.desc: When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus. // When the famous singing songbirds of Adventure Bay go missing, its PAW Patrol to the rescue!

programme.title: Best in Flow / Blizzard Wizard
programme.desc: Baby and Teensy embrace their fancy side to win a dance contest for pets. // When the owner of Iceberg Ice Cream, Scoops, has to rush out on a frosty emergency, he leaves Baby Shark and William in charge of his parlor.

programme.title: Dreams And Illusions / Dreaming Apprentices
programme.desc: While everyone sleeps peacefully, one may wonder what the Barbababies could be dreaming about. // To dream makes you grow... But what can Barbidur, Barbalala, Barbotine and Barbidou possibly dream of?

programme.title: Paddingtons Adventure Club Cracks The Case! / Paddington And Aunt Lucys Special Recipe
programme.desc: Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor Ruby. // Thanks to Aunt Lucys Special recipe the Browns set up a takeaway business from their home, but its hard work!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite
programme.desc: The Crew helps with a parking problem when Cafe Carls ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. // When Rubbles fear of the dark derails the pups Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: Big Big Boots / Backpacks Sticky Situation
programme.desc: Boots is too short to go on a ride, so he wishes to be bigger and becomes giant! Dora helps him go back to his normal size. // Backpack has something special for Dora, but she cant open! They travel to Abuela on Tallest Mountain so she can fix her.

programme.title: Zeg and the Egg
programme.desc: Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.title: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: Finloose / Operation Ernie
programme.desc: When dancing is outlawed in Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark will do whatever it takes to get the town dancing again! // Baby and William try to help Ernie make a best friend.

programme.title: Sharkdog Sitting
programme.desc: While Max is out Olivia babysits Sharkdog but she just cant keep him inside.

programme.title: Fish Fiesta Freakout
programme.desc: Everyones excited for the Foggy Springs carnival, but its getting more and more difficult to keep Sharkdog a secret.

programme.title: Sharkdog, Family
programme.desc: When the town discovers Sharkdog, Max needs to convince everyone that hes not a monster.

programme.title: The Sharkdog Days of Summer
programme.desc: Max and Sharkdog want to enjoy the last day of summer, but first, they have to deal with the mess they left at home.

programme.title: Pups Save a Bat Family / Pups Save a Mud Monster
programme.desc: A rockslide traps a Bat Family inside their cave, so the Pups have to free them! The bats search for a new home leads to problems in town though! // Snowboarders on Jakes Mountain are stuck on a broken chair lift while a monster is on the loose!

programme.title: Pups Save Francois the Penguin
programme.desc: Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse.

programme.title: The Crew Fixes The Talent Show Stage / The Crew Builds Instruments
programme.desc: When Speed Meister sabotages the stage for the town Talent Show, the pups use Motors talent to save the day. // Sierra Sparkle is coming to sing for Builder Cove Day! But when the bands instruments break, Rubble and Crew have a construction solution.

programme.title: My Cousin Chloe
programme.desc: Peppa and Georges cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Trip to the Moon
programme.desc: Peppas family go to the museums moon exhibition with Georges friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Grandpa at the Playground
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig takes Peppa and George to the playground, but does not understand the childrens rules.

programme.title: Goldie the Fish
programme.desc: Goldie the fish does not look happy and is not eating her food, so Peppa, George and Mummy Pig take her on a bus trip to visit Dr Hamster the vet.

programme.title: Spider
programme.desc: Anna and Froga are completely freaked out when they learn a spider lives in Rons treehouse with him! Ron tries his best to convince his friends that the spider is harmless.

programme.title: Impatient Christopher
programme.desc: Christopher can hardly wait for his birthday tomorrow, he delivers invitations to his friends, he tries to figure out what present they are preparing for him. Christopher learns that sleeping is the fastest way for tomorrow to come sooner!

programme.title: Popcorn / Banana
programme.desc: Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone! // Tiny Chef makes banana toast but after squishing his perfect banana, has to create a brand new dish!

programme.title: Guacamole
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: The Pickle Family Campout
programme.desc: When all the members of Pickles family get lost in the woods, Pickle teams up with Tow Truck Blaze to come to their rescue!

programme.desc: The hamsters go on a Viking dinner cruise with Harry and his family. // Greg must clear his name when Harrys homework goes missing and all clues point to him.

programme.desc: Big Hairys little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. Its time for a Jungle Rescue! // Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. Its up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: Pups Save a Goodway

programme.desc: Rubble and Crew build Builder Coves first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrols Marshall! But when Speed Meisters sneaky sabotage traps Marshalls Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: The Crew And Skye Build A Mountain Lodge
programme.desc: Skye visits Rubble and Crew from Adventure Bay when their construction project needs some aerial support. But when Speed Meister tries to beat the pups to finish the job, Skye, Rubble, and the rest of the crew jump into rescue mode to save the day!

programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick try to join the extreme sports team The Drasticals. // Sandy finds a book of worlds records, and tries to break them all with SpongeBobs help.

programme.title: Patrick-Man! / Garys New Toy
programme.desc: Patrick becomes the superhero Patrick-Man, who intends to clean up Bikini Bottom-whether it wants it or not. // Gary becomes obsessed with his new red ball, forcing SpongeBob to take drastic measures to intervene.

programme.title: License to Milkshake / Squid Baby
programme.desc: SpongeBob learns his milkshake license has expired, and is forced to go back to the milkshake academy. // Squidward hits his head and reverts to being a baby, and its up to SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of him.

programme.title: Fools Gold / Flight Plan
programme.desc: When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villas gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: I, Breakfast Bot / Dynamic Do-Over
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sids Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carls dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: A Danger Among Us
programme.desc: After Miles has a vision that Rick Twitler is still around, Danger Force travels deep into the Mans Nests to find him, running into an old foe along the way.

programme.title: Charlotte Gets Ghosted
programme.desc: Schwoz invents a vacuum to help Henry clean his house but it accidentally sucks Charlotte inside. When Henrys family hears Charlotte they think the vacuum is haunted. Ray must distract them while Henry finds a way to get her out.

programme.title: Nice Guys Finish First
programme.desc: Lincoln has a crush on Lynns new best friend, Zia, and the only thing stopping him from asking her out is... Lynn. In a series of trials and tribulations, Lincoln tries to prove to Lynn that hes worthy of dating Zia.

programme.title: Some Buddy to Love
programme.desc: Mom and Dad attempt to enjoy a day to themselves by pairing up all of the Loud siblings with each other for the day.

programme.title: Plankton Paranoia / Library Cards
programme.desc: Plankton hasnt tried to steal the secret formula in a while...and thats making Mr. Krabs nervous! // When Patrick discovers the pineapples library, SpongeBob introduces him to the wonderful world of book learning!

programme.title: The Starry Awards / Biorpsgiving
programme.desc: Patrick hosts an award ceremony. // Captain Doug Quasar meets Pat-Trons robot family.

programme.title: SpongeBob in Randomland / SpongeBobs Bad Habit
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Squidward take a delivery to a dreaded town where the laws of logic no longer apply. // SpongeBob cant stop biting his nails, but he also cant figure out why!

programme.title: April Fools Rules / Cereal Offender
programme.desc: Every April Fools Day, Luan pranks the entire household, but this year, Lincoln has a plan to not get pranked. // The Loud kids make a trip to the supermarket to do the grocery shopping for Mom, but Lincoln has other plans.

programme.title: The Loudest Yard / Raw Deal
programme.desc: When Lincolns mom signs him up for peewee football, Lincoln schemes to have Lynn take his spot. // After Lucy reads Lincolns fortune and claims his day will "end in disaster

programme.title: Little Smoothie Shop of Horrors / The Great Bat Detective
programme.desc: Wanting to be more like "boss monster" Nefera, Venus overworks and gets in over her head by refusing help. // Bunny Earickson searches for a special pollinating bat in order to locate a companion plant for a wilting Venus.

programme.title: Loud Family Court: The Flames of Justice
programme.desc: After Lincoln manages to quickly put out a fire in the kitchen the family all assembles to get to the bottom of who set the fire in the first place!

programme.title: Radioactive Cat
programme.desc: Boses Mom, Celia, picks up Schwozs lost radioactive cat from outside SW.A.G. and takes it home, so Danger Force and Captain Man have to try and get it back before she goes nuclear.

programme.title: Miles Has Visions
programme.desc: When AWOL starts seeing visions of the future right before they happen, Captain Man believes it must be the work of Swellviews leading time-crime villain, The Time Jerker.

programme.title: Make it Pop Pop
programme.desc: Nana and Pop Pop Thunderman visit, but after Phoebe accidentally reveals that Colosso is living in their house with Max, Pop Pops no-tolerance attitude toward supervillains leads him to banish Max and his bunny best friend to the Detention Zone.

programme.title: Escape from Byjovia
programme.desc: As King Gastley searches the kingdom for Max and the others, Max and the Midknights learn about a prophecy and devise a plan to escape from Byjovia to find the missing King Conrad.

programme.title: Strife of the Party / Kernel of Truth
programme.desc: When Lola learns that Lana is planning their joint birthday, she does everything to stop it. // Lincoln and the Middle School Action News Team solve the mystery of the missing popcorn.

programme.title: Cow Pie Kid / Saved by the Spell
programme.desc: Lynn pushes Liam to his limits when he becomes the star pitcher for the middle school baseball team. // Lincolns friends try to stop him from performing a magic act at the middle school talent show.

programme.title: Bishop Makes Her Move
programme.desc: The origin of the woman called BISHOP! Why does she hate mutants? What is the secret of the Mechazoids? And exactly what happened the night the Turtles fell into Bishops trap?

programme.title: Broken Alarm
programme.desc: SpongeBob breaks his precious alarm clock, but nothing else is loud enough to wake him up on time.

programme.title: Friendiversary / Mandatory Music
programme.desc: SpongeBob celebrates the anniversary of his friendship with Squidward. Squidward does not. // Squidwards lack of talent lands him in a court ordered music class.

programme.title: Dopey Dick / Plankton and the Beanstalk
programme.desc: Squidward joins a crew of sailors hunting down the great white jellyfish. // Plankton finds a magic bean that takes him to a land of giants (well, more giant than usual).

programme.title: My Friend Patty / Fun-Believable
programme.desc: SpongeBob befriends a sentient Krabby Patty whose only wish is to be eaten. // Rube hosts an episode of "FUN-Believable! With Rube" where he explores little known oddities and attractions around Bikini Bottom.

programme.title: Spatula of the Heavens / Garys Playhouse
programme.desc: SpongeBob embarks on an epic journey to have his beloved spatula reforged by the legendary Guru Greasetrap. // SpongeBob builds a snail-house outside for Gary to play in while he is at work.

programme.title: Swimming Fools / The Goobfather
programme.desc: SpongeBob builds a pool in his backyard and Squidward tries to resist taking a dip. // Mr. Krabs must reckon with the Goobfather after he adds "Patty Whips" to the menu at the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: Date with Destiny
programme.desc: Rosa hears an Ernesto Estrella prediction that Maria and Arturo could get back together - could it be true?

programme.title: Fools Gold / Flight Plan
programme.desc: When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villas gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: I, Breakfast Bot / Dynamic Do-Over
programme.desc: Ronnie Anne and her cousins hatch a plan to have Sids Breakfast Bot do their chores - ALL of them! // When Carls dreams are crushed after meeting El Falcon, Bobby decides to take on the role himself!

programme.title: Mooned! / Hysterical History
programme.desc: SpongeBob wants to catch an ultra-rare jellyfish and enlists the help of former jellyfishing champion, Kevin. // On a trip to the museum, SpongeBob and Patrick teach Sandy all about Bikini Bottoms fascinating, yet questionable, history.

programme.title: The Dirty Bubble Bass / Sheldon SquarePants
programme.desc: Bubble Bass and the Dirty Bubble team up to become Bikini Bottoms nastiest nefarious nuisance. // Plankton joins the SquarePants family in the hope of becoming closer to SpongeBob (and the secret formula).

programme.title: Teacher Oh Soon Nam
programme.desc: Bong Chul suffers from mental disorder while in jail. Soon Nam finds Bok Hee at the nursing home where Bong Chul is receiving psychological treatment.

programme.title: Teacher Oh Soon Nam
programme.desc: Yoo Min finally repents and confesses to all his crimes. Doo Mool and Soon Nam get married. Sun Joo regains her sight after a chip implant surgery.

programme.desc: Mi Gang visits Yi Chang in jail to tell him she is marrying Chi Hwan. Soon Young lures Chi Hwans men away so that Jung Im can escape with the baby.

programme.desc: This commentary programme focuses on a hot spot every week, using satellite maps as a means of demonstration and in-depth analysis of major power strategies.

programme.title: We Are One

programme.title: News On The Hour (29/12/24)

programme.title: Premium Spectacular
