programme.title: Sustainable Living S4
programme.desc: Providing inspiration that there is a different "Way of life". Some call it slow living, living off-grid. However, in this show, we describe it as self sustainable living. Providing inspiration to the audience that shows how lucky the Indonesian people are to live in a very generous land.

programme.title: Satisfactory
programme.desc: Satisfactory means fulfilling expectations or needs; acceptable, though not outstanding or perfect. Is a cooking program that will present a healthy, special, and filling menu suitable for breaking the fast. Guided by an interactive and excellent host in preparing home-cooked meals, so that the audience can easily do it at home.

programme.title: Star Life
programme.desc: A high-energy infotainment program that seamlessly blends the latest from the global celebrity landscape with the hottest local Indonesian stars and social media influencers. The shows mission is to dissect and serve up all things trendy and zeitgeisty, ensuring a rollercoaster ride of entertainment and information.

programme.title: All About Women
programme.desc: This program is a kind of story rubric that is a friend to women, especially in Indonesia and Southeast Asia in general. The program will inspire women associated with their passion for hobbies, fashion, makeup, beauty and health, astrology, and events. There will still be a part of the local wisdom but adjusted to the coverage.

programme.title: Space Of Mine
programme.desc: Everyone dreams of having a dream home. A dream home doesnt have to be big and grand, but the most important thing is that it is comfortable and fits the owners personality. This program will provide inspiration from peoples stories about their unique homes.

programme.title: The Travel Note S5
programme.desc: The Travel Note is a light travel program that discusses about tourist attractions, which includes history, culture, variety culinary there and also the comfortable and affordable hotel. Presented by a young, attractive and dynamic host. The Travel Note also provides some tips and tricks to the audiences.

programme.title: The $100 Nomad
programme.desc: Got a weekend, an adventurous spirit and a hundred dollars? We fly Xenia, Fauzi and Zhin to 10 unexplored destinations with only $100 for food, activities and lodging. By chasing unreal landscapes and spending nights at unlikely abodes where no tourists go, the $100 nomads prove that budget stands in no way of a grand adventure.

programme.title: Factory Story
programme.desc: Food or goods that we encounter in everyday life without us realizing it go through a long process. Machines and hands that work hard behind the manufacture of a food, drink or goods are the main factors for the success of a product

programme.title: Beyond The Barn
programme.desc: Beyond The Barn wants the program to invite the audience to look beyond traditional livestock farming, by highlighting the business potential that can be generated. For example, cowhide produced from the farm can be used as raw material for leather shoes, showing how creativity can turn agricultural or livestock products into profitable businesses.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesias wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesias wild ecosystems.

programme.title: Heres a dragonfly
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, shes able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: A mouse in the house
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: A surprise for Talia
programme.desc: Lito, Roxy, PomPom, Noa and Talya form the Giganto Club. They are little dinosaurs with a passion for everything that affects them and all the other dinosaurs. In each episode, they share their knowledge through dance, play and song.

programme.title: The race
programme.desc: Lito, Roxy, PomPom, Noa and Talya form the Giganto Club. They are little dinosaurs with a passion for everything that affects them and all the other dinosaurs. In each episode, they share their knowledge through dance, play and song.

programme.title: Just like grandma
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy whos curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: The art of hair
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Little Ahiwa
programme.desc: Little Ahiwa lost her mother when she was very young. Her father re-married, but the step-mother was very unkind to little Ahiwa. Despite her suffering, Ahiwa managed to carry on smiling. Her step-mother is furious, and determined to make Ahiwas life as difficult as possible.

programme.title: La Vie De Chateau - Violette Et Regis
programme.desc: Violette, an eight-year-old orphan, goes to live with her uncle Regis, a cleaner at the Palace of Versailles. Violette hates him: she thinks he stinks. However, in the corridors of the Sun King, the stubborn little girl and the big bear soften up and navigate their grief together.

programme.title: The spfffiral
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, its a busy programme for everyone. But itll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: Ils Font Rayonner La France

programme.title: Versailles, are you there?
programme.desc: A medium is found murdered in the gardens of the Palace of Versailles. Antoine and Florence suspect a group of amateur historians with a passion for Marie-Antoinette. They tried to communicate with the deceased to find a precious object belonging to the queen. Was it her famous necklace?

Lack of sleep, change in diet, new environment... with their usual habits turned upside down, its difficult to adapt.

In a house open to surprises and the unexpected, between emotion and laughter, each reveals the invisible thread of their personal story...

programme.title: Flora Mikula
programme.desc: One of the few women to have forged a career in a male-dominated world, the chef Flora Mikula settled in the Camargue. She guides us from Nimes to the boundaries of the Rhone delta, on foot, on horseback, by car... for wonderful food, cheery banter and general love of life.

programme.title: Marie-Line Et Son Juge
programme.desc: Marie-Line, energetic and cheerful, leads a precarious life in Le Havre and cares for her depressive father. After a row with her boyfriend, she ends up having to pay damages and interest, and loses her job. Not having a driving licence, the judge invites her to become his chauffeur.

programme.title: Allegresse
programme.desc: Whilst hes supposed to be looking after his daughter, with whom he isnt particularly close, a funeral director is entrusted with the ashes of a complete unknown. Together they try to find a way to pay tribute to the deceased and end up forging unexpected ties...

programme.title: Taratata : Lhistoire
programme.desc: 30 years, over 500 programmes, 1,500 artists, 4,600 live performances, discoveries, magical cover versions for duos and trios, international stars... programme.desc: Maximilien de Wazieres is a farmer in the Hauts-de-France region. Today, like others before him, he wants to become a winegrower. Crazy? No. In recent years global warming and changes to European regulations have dealt him a new hand: it is now possible to sell wine made in the Nord.

programme.title: A new start
programme.desc: Veronique Claveau and Bryan Audet begin the adventure of growing their own food, with plenty of advice from edith and Dany. The latter also discover where the Sacres-Coeurs de Saint-Bruno Academy school is planning to create its future educational garden.

programme.title: Lactu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64 Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64 Le Monde En Francais - 2e Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Linvite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64 Lessentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans Lair
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: En-route to discover the mills of Auvergne
programme.desc: A voyage of discovery to explore the mills of Auvergne, between the regions of Margeride and Livradois, deep in the heart of the Massif Central.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Caroline and David
programme.desc: Caroline, David and their two teenagers leave Trois-Rivieres to start over from scratch in Matane, Gaspe Peninsula.

programme.title: Jean Renard, Une etoile De Lombre
programme.desc: 120 million records sold, 1,200 compositions, 69 hits... A portrait of Jean Renard, for whom every sound is a musical note. The French composer recounts his unique life and career, or how his life changed forever on the day he presented Sylvie Vartan with a song for Johnny Hallyday.

programme.title: Le 6h00 Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauque and Damien Thevenot at weekends.

programme.title: Stews from near and far
programme.desc: A journey through the world of the not so humble stew. Chantal Lamarre shows off her Irish roots with an Irish stew, whilst Joanne Chery prepares a goat fricassee, and we explore the flavour of North Africa with Arik de Vienne.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Caroline and David
programme.desc: Caroline, David and their two teenagers leave Trois-Rivieres to start over from scratch in Matane, Gaspe Peninsula.

programme.desc: A voyage of discovery to explore the mills of Auvergne, between the regions of Margeride and Livradois, deep in the heart of the Massif Central.

programme.title: Nap time
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.title: Poo poopidoo
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.title: Good dinosaur
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: King of the village
programme.desc: Whenever an animal is stressed or bothered about something, they head straight to see Claude the bull. Well-known as a doctor for minor ills, he is particularly skilled in soothing everyday troubles and resolving misunderstandings. With Claudes help, the animals learn to love themselves as they are: imperfect.

programme.title: Droles Doiseaux
programme.desc: Ellie, aged ten and a half, is mad about birds. One day, she must urgently return a book to the school library, which is closed. Ellie decides to take it to Anna, the librarian, who lives on an island on the Loire, not far away. An island full of birds...

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables dOlonne.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion

programme.title: So like Switzerland
programme.desc: The families get together at the camp in Twin Lake, thus opening a new chapter of their adventure. But being together doesnt necessary mean being united as a tribe. Sharing learning and everyday activities changes the dynamics of the group, despite the reluctance and difficulties experienced by Marcel and Patricia.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Super Bourres
programme.desc: Its the final day of high school. Janus and Sam have to provide the drinks for the end-of-year party. Searching through the contents of Januss fathers cellar in search of a few bottles, they discover a strange machine...

programme.title: All That Is Bitter Is Sweet
programme.desc: HUNG BING makes it clear that YAT-YUEN can hardly survive if he has to hand in a thousand silver dollars to NGAI CHUN within a few days, because YAT-YUEN does not want to burn down the medicine nor sell the machines.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: Golden Banquet
programme.desc: Host Steven Ma calls on nine star chefs to create a "golden feast" for TVBs 55th anniversary in Taiwan! The programme also visits famous chefs in the city to gather valuable ingredients.

programme.title: Hands Up
programme.desc: This childrens programme encourages children to ask questions, express themselves, and move towards their goals!

programme.title: Short End Of The Stick
programme.desc: With the end of the millennia-long imperial period, three palace eunuchs struggle to live a normal life when they become servants for a family.

programme.title: Life Made Simple
programme.desc: TING SHEUNG WONG (KWOK CHUN ON) is a 30 years old man with the IQ of a seven years old boy. Ironically, he is surely happier than anyone else._x000D__x000D_WONGs simple life ends when his best friend from childhood, WONG KEI FUNG CATHERINE (HSUAN JESSICA HESTER), goes to the U.S. to study. In order to realise FUNGs dream of studying abroad, WONG gives her all his savings. She works at the Chungs International Company Limited after her study.

programme.title: My Ages Apart
programme.desc: Mentor and mentee, SUNG CHUNG-KEI (Bobby Au Yeung) and KWONG KONG-SANG (Moses Chan), are highly-regarded bankers. To move up the corporate ladder, KONG-SANG deliberately transfers CHUNG-KEI out, but the plane CHUNG-KEI takes crashes. After regaining his consciousness, CHUNG-KEI finds himself trapped in the body of a millennial named BAO PAU (James Ng).

programme.title: The Sky is the Limit
programme.desc: CHOW KWOK CHING (Lam Bowie) was a disorderly guy with no ambitions. Though he was in his thirties, he did not have a career and changed jobs constantly. Under his mothers pressure, CHING determined to join the police force. He did not do his work very well and finally was assigned to Sha Tau Kok where the border is. Meanwhile, CHING had misunderstanding with a mainland girl KAM LAN (Cheung Ho Yee, Maggie). He even perceived LAN as a bad woman and considered her as a sign of misfortune to him.

programme.title: Missing You
programme.desc: A Tracing Services Organization established its service to exclusively assist individuals to locate their missing family members who have been separated due to wars, natural disasters, relocation or other exceptional family circumstances. The members of the organization include stubborn and paranoid HONG YU-FUNG (Linda Chung), zealous optimist SZE YIK-HIM (Jason Chan), glib-tongued SIN KIT-CHING (Cilla Kung) and computer expert YEUNG TSZ-KEI (Calvin Chan).

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: When MAN TAI LOIs (CHUNG KING FAI) eldest grandson FREEMAN (LAU HOI WAI, HAWICK) decides to become a singer, LOI is the only one who opposes it. However, he feels that his influence in the family has declined since his retirement, so he decides not to insist on his opinions. _x000D__x000D_LOIs son CHIU KIT (HA YU) is suddenly elevated to the head of the family. KIT used to be looked down upon by other family members.

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: LAM FEI (Miriam Yeung) is a beautiful, trendy yet cheerful "Wonder Women" housewife. She and her husband, an architect SHEUNG KIM-HUNG (Raymond Wong) and a smart and active son SHEUNG KAI-KAI are living a happy life. LAM FEI has two buddies, a career woman, MAN FUNG-WAH (Alice Chan) and a pretty and wealthy wife MA SEE-LUI (Rebecca Zhu). Each of this trio has her own ideas about romance and encounter different up and down of love. KIM-HUNG develops his career.

programme.title: The Ringmaster
programme.desc: Muay Thai champion Hoi Ching-hei (Shuan Tam) manages to hold his ground in his farewell match. However, after a celebration gathering, he soon abruptly meets his death as he quarrels with someone while saving some drunk woman. Hoi Ching-nam (Owen Cheung) reviews his elder brother Ching-heis boxing match video. He finds out the cause of death surprisingly has something to do with coach Shek Ngo-shan (Wayne Lai). He is certain Ngo-shan has killed Ching-hei.

programme.title: The Seventh Day
programme.desc: The tale begins on the seventh of August, when WING and YAN first encounter their own dream girl on the island. WING works as a lifeguard on the outlying island. He gets to know pet shop assistant LING KA-YAN (CHOW LAI KI, NIKI) by chance and is soon mesmerized by her endearing personality. YAN who works at a coffee shop meets a romance comic artist called WONG CHI-KWAN (TONG SZE WING, NATALIE). Being misled into believing that the girl is from a rich family, YAN decides to chase her.

programme.title: Highs and Lows
programme.desc: As a Senior Inspector of the Narcotics Bureau Operation Unit, HEUNG WING (Miu Kiu Wai) profoundly abhors evil. He and WAI SAI-LOK (Raymond Lam) - Senior Inspector of the Intelligence Unit have closely co-operated with each other as peer mentors, frequently solving drug trafficking cases for the Police Force. During an operation to knock down the targets, SAI-LOK discovers clues that HEUNG WING is most likely the corrupt cop in a collusion conspiracy with drug dealers.

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: When MAN TAI LOIs (CHUNG KING FAI) eldest grandson FREEMAN (LAU HOI WAI, HAWICK) decides to become a singer, LOI is the only one who opposes it. However, he feels that his influence in the family has declined since his retirement, so he decides not to insist on his opinions. _x000D__x000D_LOIs son CHIU KIT (HA YU) is suddenly elevated to the head of the family. KIT used to be looked down upon by other family members.

programme.title: Have a nice dream
programme.desc: Theres a saying that "You can always get inspired by nature." Five outdoor enthusiasts-a cook, an athlete, a photographer, and two ecological experts-plan a two-day trip to enjoy the ultimate getaway in Taiwan. They share mysterious secret spots that have yet to be discovered, and places that are hard to access, featuring breathtaking mountain scenes and some of the bluest waters in the world. They also educate people on how to preserve Taiwans beautiful and gifted environment.
